title: You’re Doing Amazing Sweetie: A Kardashian Recap Show | It Was All A Stream
description:
The Kardashians are back! After a bombshell Season 2 premiere, Amelia Wedemeyer and Zack Peter sit down to discuss the popular family. The duo get into a Kardashian product review and Kourtney’s new brand “Lemme” (2:55) before diving deep into the Khloe/Tristan Thompson baby drama (9:00), including the news that they have a new son via surrogate; plus, what we can expect on future episodes (40:45).
Hosts: Amelia Wedemeyer and Zack Peter
Producer: Devon Renaldo
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
